channel.title: Machine Learning on Kartik Rawool
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Kartik Rawool

item.title: Natural Language Processing - Sentiment Analysis of COVID-19 Tweets
item.description: Trained a Machine Learning model to detect sentiment of tweets related to Covid-19.

item.title: Web Development and Machine Learning - Wound Detection and Universal ID
item.description: Developed a web app using Django which classified a wound image as severe or non-severe, and upon detection, prompted the user with a relevant action.

item.title: Regression Analysis - Flight Ticket Price Prediction
item.description: Trained a Machine Learning model to predict the price of flight ticket
